<mxGeometry x="3961" y="-1947.63" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="X96j3WFVWpDhYMfCsQ3Z-22" value="<div>We need to discuss whether we want to unregister oganisations or not. If so, who can do this? (E.g. the superadmin, the&nbsp;ESG accountants themselves)&nbsp;</div><div>And if an organisation is unregistered, do we lose their data or can we keep it for historical reasons?</div>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="3870" y="-1804.63" width="350" height="96" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="X96j3WFVWpDhYMfCsQ3Z-23" value="<p>Until now, here there was an activity where the organisation completed the registration. Do we still want this?</p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="4060" y="-1971.75" width="169" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="X96j3WFVWpDhYMfCsQ3Z-24" value="<p>The requests to use a method are assessed in each affected network separately<br></p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="3969" y="-2060" width="169" height="70.75" as="geometry" /> it is&nbsp;</div><div>the first time)</div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontColor=#0F6FFF;" parent="1" div.div: We need to discuss whether we want to unregister oganisations or not. If so, who can do this? (E.g. the superadmin, the ESG accountants themselves)
And if an organisation is unregistered, do we lose their data or can we keep it for historical reasons?
